channel.title: Hlm on Laurent Smeets
channel.description: Recent content in Hlm on Laurent Smeets

item.title: HLM Tutorial: Popularity Data
item.description: This document shows how you can replicate the popularity data multilevel models from Multilevel analysis: Techniques and applications (Hox, J. J., Moerbeek, M., & van de Schoot, R, 2018), Chapter 2. In this manual the software package HLM7 for Windows was used.
